title: BEL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 20 Project Engineer I Posts
description: The Bharat Electronics Limited (BEL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 20 Project Engineer -I Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Electronics, Electrical Engineering can apply for the BEL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, sele...
